entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 2. POP 30%

entry.title: Sunday: Chance of flurries or rain showers. High 7. POP 40%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 40 percent chance of flurries in the morning then 40 percent chance of rain showers in the afternoon. Snow level rising to 1200 metres in the afternoon. High 7. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PST Saturday 18 February 2023
